## Problem 1

Read the dataset and save the sample.
```{r}
population = read.csv("./ce8130entire.csv")
library(dplyr)
set.seed(1000) 
A = population %>%
  group_by(sex) %>%
  sample_n(100)
```

## Problem 2

Save a separate sample.
```{r}
set.seed(1000) 
B = population %>%
  group_by(sex) %>%
  sample_n(30)
```
